clinical_history: Thyroid swelling and suspected nodular disease.
technique: High-resolution linear and curvilinear probes used for detailed evaluation.
findings: Soft tissue region demonstrates unremarkable without fluid collection.
Urinary bladder is well-defined, no intraluminal lesions.
Gallbladder shows unremarkable, no stones or wall thickening.
Testes are unremarkable with normal vascularity.
Left kidney shows isoechoic, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
